title: Lets play a game
body: For every post you see about someone complaining about there placements donate $1 towards helping a starving child in Africa  ---------------->  http://my.worldvision.com.au/make-a-donation/food-aid-individual-supporters.aspx?source=SEM_Non-Grant_G%7CFood-Aid_Starvation_MTBM_%20%20+starvation%20+in%20+africa&gclid=CjwKEAiArdG1BRCLvs_q-IObwxMSJACXbLtzxNdA5Aqy7BRhA7CkYxNUk5b5otYYL3vwDI2lmZCcvxoC32bw_wcB

replies.body: Would you still be bankrupt if you only donated when you saw my rant threads?

> [{quoted}](name=YellowBrickRoad,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oUxgkWtM,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-02-06T15:26:00.273+0000)
>
> Would you still be bankrupt if you only donated when you saw my rant threads?

Yes.
